Data Fields
mcu_action_t Struct Reference

#include <types.h>

Detailed Description

This structure defines an action to take when an asynchronous event occurs (such as a pin change interrupt).

Data Fields

u8 channel
 
s8 prio
 
u32 o_events
 
mcu_event_handler_t handler
 

Field Documentation

◆ channel

u8 mcu_action_t::channel

The channel (a GPIO pin or timer channel)

◆ handler

mcu_event_handler_t mcu_action_t::handler

Event handler

◆ o_events

u32 mcu_action_t::o_events

The peripheral specific event

◆ prio

s8 mcu_action_t::prio

The interrupt priority
